title: Topics navigation and theory completion
description:
Intuitive and easy navigation to previous or next topic is now available in the bottom part of each topic;
Topics with only theory now got the "Done" button, after mastering study material press it to update your progress

title: Breadcrumps navigation
description: Opening any topic above learning materials you will see detailed navigation which represents yor current path in such form: module/lesson/topic

title: Lessons progressbar
description: Besides your overall progress in your profile page, platform is now also tracking your progress in each lesson separately. You can see this progress by opening any module, each lesson will have its own progressbar

title: Introducing platform changelog!
description: All changes, updates, new features etc. will appear in this page

title: Leaderboard
description: Introducing leaderboard which shows top 10 users on the platform. Compare your progress with other users, master your knowledge to get on top! You can check it here <link>https://www.learn-apex.com/leaderboard</link> or find it in dropdown menu under your profile

title: Apex Hunger Games
description:
Hey :) 

We created a Leaderboard based on how many tasks you have.

And we're starting Learn Apex games - the competition until 14.04.2024 (14th April)

With the following prizes:
- Place 1: 1 hour of consultation with me
- Place 2: 1 hour of consultation with me
- Place 3: 1 hour of consultation with me

Quite simple :)

But the best price: You learning Apex.

We also added on the platform:
+ 38 different tasks (Maps, variables, etc)
+ New topic explanation on Boolean Table
+ Fixed many tasks

title: Platform gamification
description:
1. Achievements. In your profile page you can see list of achievements, hovering on them will show your current progress of each of them.

2. Major update for user progress. From now all your progress has xp based system:
- You're gaining xp not only for solving tasks, but also for completing topics and unlocking achievements as well;
- Your level now also depends on gained xp, you can see your level and its progress at the top right corner or in your profile page

Happy coding :)

title: User's activity heatmap & new leaderboard
description:
1. Heatmap was added to your profile page so now you can see your progress more precisely

2. Leaderboard now shows all time top users in global tab and top users monthly in the current month tab

title: Code checker update
description: Reworked code checer layout, all the controls are now in one place & added responsive design to checker for better user experience

title: New type of tasks, solutions update & more
description:
- New type of tasks
In tasks with Salesforce logo you will need to write some code in your org and then click Run Code to check it and get a feedback. More coming soonðŸ˜‰

- Update of your actual progress
All lessons&topics that were done by you will be shown as "not completed" everytime there are new tasks.

- Solutions for tasks
When task is completed, in the Solution there will be available both your and platform solutions for it
- Task difficulties and xp reward shown
Every task in the list now have small badges that are showing difficulty and reward for this task

title: Tablet&mobile support
description: Platform now is fully responsive to all kinds of devices

title: Debug logs tab
description: All your System.debug() will be logged in the tab below code editor. Developer Console-like full log is also available

title: Interactive visualizer
description:
Understanding methods in Apex is made easy! New visualizer  will guide you on how methods in Apex are working with step by step info and what are they changing after each line being executed. Fully responsive, fully resizable to your comfort
Try new feature: <link>https://www.learn-apex.com/modules/syntax_and_basics/65ae8e1204510a00c27882dc/65acfb7fa35d11beb1ef1cc6</link> and other topics related to methods

title: Redirect to org
description:
- After connecting an org you can quickly navigate to it using arrow near connect/disconnect org button in header
- More intuitive layout of tasks to be solved in your org with quick navigation to your org as well
- bug fixes (error during generating logs while opening a task or submitting your code)

title: Readable URLs
description:
URL links now are fully readable so you can clearly see your current path e.g. "/modules/syntax-and-basics/for-each/-for-each-loop"
All old links like "modules/syntax_and_basics/65ae8e1204510a00c27882/65a838abfeef90604e1c6/" are invalid now, following those links will cause an error

title: Flashcards
description:
New feature that will enhance your studying experience! This new feature will help you to properly absorb and retain learning materials. Relearning process will adapt to your learning style and most important it relies on actual science-based algorithm for learning.
Try new feature: <link>https://www.learn-apex.com/flashcards</link>
